ing: 2 packets Wholesome Organic Stevia, or more to taste
des: "Green tea with a sweet twist! This iced tropical tea is sweetened with organic stevia and is the perfect combination of energy and refreshment."
ins:
Prepare tropical tea with hot water. Remove tea bags once well steeped.
Stir in lemon juice, orange juice and Wholesome Organic Stevia.
Let cool and add ice.
